itemDescription: English mountaineer, adventurer, author, television presenter and motivational speaker

wikipedia_page.main: David "Dave" Cornthwaite (born 1979) is an English adventurer, writer and filmmaker. He is best known for his Expedition1000 project, a plan to undertake 25 separate journeys of 1000 miles or more, each using a different form of non-motorised transport.

response: A record for the longest distance traveled on a longboard was set by David Cornthwaite in 2006 when he skated  across Australia, from Perth to Brisbane. That record was broken by Rob Thomas of New Zealand, who skated .
*David Cornthwaite (born 1979), English adventurer, writer, and filmmaker
